name: DJ Adam's Interdimensional Mixtape 2019 [Prototype]
description:
DJ Adam sets out on an interdimensional journey battling the Lord of Dimensions and his minions in order to set the record straight and put our reality back on track!

2018 was when I really decided I wanted to make games. I've been learning Unity, pixel art, programming, coding, you name it, all from scratch. DJ Adam's Interdimensional Mixtape 2019 is a prototype for a game I would love to eventually come back to and build upon exponentially when my skills get better.

In it's current state, I (sort of) completed the prototype for the game jam Finally Finish Something 2019. I think it gets the basic ideas and feel of what I was going for. There's plenty of rough edges but I'm proud of this. I've learned SO MUCH from this project it's hard to believe one year ago I didn't know how to do any of this.

Thanks to Patrick Pena for helping me with the initial concept.

Thanks to my wife for continuing to support me locking myself in front of a computer and staring at pixels and code for hours.

Thanks to everyone who gives this messy little game a shot.

Music credits: https://www.purple-planet.com
